recipe.title: Pineapple and Gin
ingredients: Optional garnish: Pineapple wedges and mint sprigs
instructions: Combine 3 cups pineapple pieces, frozen + 6 ounces gin + 2 ounces simple syrup + 1 ounce fresh lime juice + 1 ounce pineapple juice + 2 cups ice optional garnish: Pineapple wedges and mint sprigs
